about_the_game:
Void Titans are rogue, terraforming machines, determined to replicate and destroy, consuming everything in their path. Void Titans convert the land into base matter and energy, allowing them to teleport across The Void, and replicate themselves.


To combat this threat, a group formed, called the Void Watch. This group trains elite soldiers and equips them with the tech needed to gather all types of matter and convert it into helpful devices, including devices strong enough to kill Void Titans.


Play as Jarek Varon, one of these elite soldiers, and embark on missions to delay a Void Titan, kill a Void Titan, or clear civilians from a Void Titan's path. With each successful mission you will earn personal matter to spend on new device blueprints that can unlock new strategies. As your skills progress, uncover the origin of the Void Titans and learn how they can be stopped forever.


Between missions, you can also spend your earnings on customizing and upgrading your home space in order to show off your scores and personality in your new home.

Features:
  • Procedural terrain generation.
  • Compelling story to discover.
  • 4+ challenging game modes found throughout the story.
  • Unlockable upgrades and devices.
  • Menu customization for optimal crafting and speed.
  • Base building and decorating.

name: Void Titan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel (R) HD Graphics 630 or compatable
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 SUPER
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: A unique side scroller with roguelike elements, collect and craft in order to stop giant, terraforming machines that consume the world behind you.
